name: @mojos/subgraph
description: A subgraph that indexes mojos events
author: Mojos

scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn clean && yarn prepare:rinkeby && yarn codegen && yarn deploy pavelespitia/mojo-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:fantom: yarn clean && yarn prepare:fantom && yarn codegen && yarn deploy pavelespitia/mojo-fantom
scripts.deploy:fantomTest: yarn clean && yarn prepare:fantomTest && yarn codegen && yarn deploy pavelespitia/mojo-fantombeta
scripts.deploy:optimistic: yarn clean && yarn prepare:optimistic && yarn codegen && yarn deploy kingassune/mojos
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn codegen && yarn deploy mojosdao/mojos-subgraph
